title: Burger Green - Food Truck
typeOfFood: Vegan, Western, Fast food, Take-out only
description: Food truck serving vegan food, reported no longer offering honey dijon mustard sauce as of Nov 2015. Choose from various patties (made of tofu, hemp, rice, kidney beans, cabbage and corn) and sauces. Vegan cheese available. Also offering (partly organic) soft drinks. Has 2 standing tables.
